name: Sharpening Stone Station
description: Utility Station: Double-click to set out a model of the Towers of Lion's Arch, which allows players in the area to sharpen their weapons. Station stays active for five minutes.

details.name: Enhancement
details.description:
Gain Power Equal to 3% of Your Precision
Gain Power Equal to 6% of Your Ferocity
+10% Experience from Kills
